actions.description: The thief makes three Shortsword or Shortbow attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: 7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Shortbow

languages: any one language (usually Common) plus thieves' cant
name: Master Thief [MoM]

specialTraits.description: If the thief is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the thief instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails, provided the thief isn't incapacitated.
specialTraits.name: Evasion
